    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"

>
[Lion's Might](/Feats.aspx?ID=3411) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Bright Lion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=129)

**Prerequisites**
[Bright Lion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2172)

</column>

---

You've trained with the weapons of the Bright Lions. You gain access to [lion scythes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=247) and [sun slings](/Weapons.aspx?ID=248). Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank with lion scythes and sun slings.

<title level="2">Lion's Might leads to...</title>
[Lion's Fury](/Feats.aspx?ID=3412)
